  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Loggable, Startable

    public class ConcurrentLogWriter
extends ConcurrentWriter
implements Loggable, Startable
    A concurrent log writer for Integration Server.
